node.Title: Now Open–AWS Region in Spain
node.Description: The AWS Region in Aragón, Spain, is now open. The official name is Europe (Spain), and the API name is eu-south-2. You can start using it today to deploy workloads and store your data in Spain. The AWS Europe (Spain) Region has three Availability Zones (AZ) that you can use to reliably spread your applications […]

node.Description: The AWS Heroes program celebrates and recognizes builders who are making an impact within the global AWS community. As we come to the end of 2022, the program is recognizing seven individuals who are passionate about AWS, and focused on organizing and speaking at community events, mentoring, authoring content, and even preserving wildlife. node.Title: Sapling: Source control that’s user-friendly and scalable
node.Description:
Sapling is a new Git-compatible source control client. Sapling emphasizes usability while also scaling to the largest repositories in the world. ReviewStack is a demonstration code review UI for GitHub pull requests that integrates with Sapling to make reviewing stacks of commits easy. You can get started using Sapling today.  Source control is one of [...]

Read More...

The post Sapling: Source control that’s user-friendly and scalable appeared first on Engineering at Meta.

node.Description:
Thanksgiving is one of my all-time favorite holidays. From the cooking and baking, to seeing my home filled with all my family and friends, nothing fills my cup more than being the hostess of the holiday. node.Title: Forecast and Recommendations: 2022 Elastic Global Threat Report
Elastic’s 2022 Global Threat Report: A roadmap for navigating today’s growing threatscape
Generate RUM-based metrics to track historical trends in customer experience
node.Description: Datadog Real User Monitoring (RUM) provides end-to-end visibility into the user experience and performance of your browser and mobile applications. RUM allows you to capture and retain complete user sessions for 30 days. This means you can pinpoint bugs, prioritize issues, and determine fixes with data collected across an entire quarter.We’re excited to announce that you can now go further with your data by generating metrics from all of your RUM events.

node.Title: Elastic Stack 8.5.1 released
node.Description:
Version 8.5.1 of the Elastic Stack was released today. We recommend you upgrade to this latest version. We recommend 8.5.1 over the previous 8.5.0 version.

For details of the issues that have been fixed and a full list of changes for each product in this version, refer to the release notes:

8.5.1 Release Notes

Elastic Stack

  • Elasticsearch
  • Kibana
  • Beats
  • Logstash

Elastic Enterprise Search

  • Enterprise Search

Elastic Observability

  • APM

Elastic Security

  • Elastic Security Solution

node.Title: Stuck in the Middle: Conquering Writer’s Block
node.Description:
The nightmare begins something like this: You’re in your groove, typing or scribbling away. The words are flowing beautifully, then, suddenly… nothing. You’ve hit a wall. All momentum vanishes. You can’t focus. You can’t think. Your frustration boils over, and the words are abandoned. Pretty scary, huh? Every writer has moments like this. Maybe you’re stumped about what comes next, unsure of how to move forward. Or perhaps your motivation

Continue reading...
